name: Emolga EX
author: Eske Yoshinob

attacks.name: Energy Glide
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a {L} Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you attached Energy in this way, switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electron Crush
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 30 more damage.

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
